fields.description:
h4. Problem Description

fields.summary: Android: Crash report from Google Play

comments.body: We do not support release 1.7.6 anymore so build this application with 2.0.1 release and see if the issue persists.
This issue has been marked as a low priority issue as we don't support 1.7.X release anymore.
User changed SDK. If we got any reports, we will track them with the newer SDK
